paragraph.paragraph:
A file item's properties are accessible from the Visual Studio .NET
ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfPropertyBrowser.htm properties window . To view the properties window:
Select a file item in your EiffelEnvision url*Project.
Choose View, Properties menu.
The properties window may also been shown for any selected item by pressing the F4 keyboard shortcut or by choosing Properties from a file item's context menu.

File Name
The name of the file item, the same as in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htm Solution Explorer window. Changing this property will rename the corresponding file item on disk.

Full Path
The full path to the file item on disk.

Missing
This property indicates if the corresponding file on disk exists. If Yes the file cannot be found.

Read Only
Indicates if the corresponding file on disk has the Read-Only attribute set. When set to Yes the file cannot be edited using any editor, in or outside of Visual Studio .NET, adhering to the Read-Only file attribute.
